Trigger You reduce your primary target to 0 Hit Points using @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.actions.Item.6ctkxUnVwqooSvgg]{Auto-Fire}.

With a subtle gesture of your weapon and a stare, you remind a survivor of your onslaught that there's more where that came from. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} a single creature that was in the area of your Auto-Fire; you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to this check. If you have legendary proficiency in Intimidation, or if you have the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e-anachronism.class-features.Item.ajzZpzc8uMtgU6N8]{Action Hero} fighting style and the target of Collateral Witness is the enemy closest to you, you can use this as a free action with the same trigger.
